data.title: Vax for the Win
data.author: Peggy Gartin
data.excerpt: Vax for the Win California’s vaccine incentive program Get vaccinated, get rewarded Thank you for getting your COVID-19 shots! Vaccinated Californians won millions of dollars in prizes and perks, and made California safer. Truly, your actions saved lives. We’ve chosen winners for the final Vax for the Win drawings: 6 California dream vacations! Winners are […]
